title: Competency Development Program for Adult Learners to Adopt Online Learning Platforms

context.additional_context: Designed for non-degree-seeking adult learners in science to overcome online learning platform adaptation barriers and foster positive acceptance attitudes. Digital devices are provided, and practical experience is accumulated through small-scale projects

learning_goals: Learners can independently utilize three or more key features of an online learning platform interface.
Learners complete two or more feedback cycles with peers using digital collaboration tools during PBL task performance.
Learners identify five barriers to technology acceptance and propose three or more personalized strategies to overcome them.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
